mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.member_id AS user_id, r.store_id, r.score, r.content, r.created_at, m.nickname FROM review r JOIN member m ON r.member_id = m.id WHERE r.store_id = #{store_id} ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (id, member_id, store_id, score, content, created_at) VALUES (#{id}, #{member_id}, #{store_id}, #{score}, #{content}, #{created_at})
